title: Type Alias hides lifetime errors
body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

Using a type alias hides certain lifetime related errors.

This is code adopted from `src/test/ui/self/self_lifetime-async.rs` that I discovered while working on #104321 

```rust
pub struct Foo<'a>(&'a ());

impl Foo<'static> {
    pub fn using_type<'a>(self: &Foo<'static>, arg: &'a ()) -> &() {
        arg
    }
}
```

as well as the async variant:

```rust
impl Foo<'static> {
    pub async fn using_type_async<'a>(self: &Foo<'static>, arg: &'a ()) -> &() {
        arg
    }
}
```

both fail with a lifetime error:

```rust
error: lifetime may not live long enough
 --> playground\async-codegen\src\lib.rs:5:9
  |
4 |     pub fn using_type<'a>(self: &Foo<'static>, arg: &'a ()) -> &() {
  |                       --        - let's call the lifetime of this reference `'1`
  |                       |
  |                       lifetime `'a` defined here
5 |         arg
  |         ^^^ associated function was supposed to return data with lifetime `'1` but it is returning data with lifetime `'a`
```

... whereas when using a type alias for `Foo<'static>`, the code compiles just fine:

```rust
type Alias = Foo<'static>;
impl Alias {
    pub fn using_alias<'a>(self: &Alias, arg: &'a ()) -> &() {
        arg
    }
    pub async fn using_alias_async<'a>(self: &Alias, arg: &'a ()) -> &() {
        arg
    }
}
```

Either I am completely misunderstanding how type aliases are supposed to work, or using an alias indeed hides problems that it shouldn’t?

### Meta
<!--
If you're using the stable version of the compiler, you should also check if the
bug also exists in the beta or nightly versions.
-->

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (70f8737b2 2022-11-23)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 70f8737b2f5d3bf7d6b784fad00b663b7ff9feda
commit-date: 2022-11-23
host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
